item.title: The Simpsons is Somehow Still on and Monika was here
item.description: The Simpsons is Somehow Still on The Air TADA
item.content:encoded:
Save me, Jeebus. Yes! I am a citizen! Now which way to the welfare office? I'm kidding, I'm kidding. I work, I work. Stan Lee never left. I'm afraid his mind is no longer in mint condition. Brace yourselves gentlemen. According to the gas chromatograph, the secret ingredient is… Love!? Who's been screwing with this thing?

Well, he's kind of had it in for me ever since I accidentally ran over his dog. Actually, replace "accidentally" with "repeatedly" and replace "dog" with "son." That's why I love elementary school, Edna. The children believe anything you tell them.

Donuts. Is there anything they can't do? Weaseling out of things is important to learn. It's what separates us from the animals…except the weasel. Dear Mr. President, There are too many states nowadays. Please, eliminate three. P.S. I am not a crackpot.

A lifetime of working with nuclear power has left me with a healthy green glow…and left me as impotent as a Nevada boxing commissioner. A woman is a lot like a refrigerator. Six feet tall, 300 pounds…it makes ice.

Please do not offer my god a peanut. Our differences are only skin deep, but our sames go down to the bone. Your guilty consciences may make you vote Democratic, but secretly you all yearn for a Republican president to lower taxes, brutalize criminals, and rule you like a king!

item.title: Watch: Teen gets into Swordfight with Ghost
item.content:encoded:
The plans you refer to will soon be back in our hands. Still, she's got a lot of spirit. I don't know, what do you think? I find your lack of faith disturbing. You mean it controls your actions? Dantooine. They're on Dantooine.

In my experience, there is no such thing as luck. You mean it controls your actions? The plans you refer to will soon be back in our hands. No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no weapons. You can't possibly…

Don't underestimate the Force. Ye-ha! I find your lack of faith disturbing. Hey, Luke! May the Force be with you. No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no weapons. You can't possibly… Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him.

I'm surprised you had the courage to take the responsibility yourself. Escape is not his plan. I must face him, alone. I find your lack of faith disturbing. Leave that to me. Send a distress signal, and inform the Senate that all on board were killed.

Don't act so surprised, Your Highness. You weren't on any mercy mission this time. Several transmissions were beamed to this ship by Rebel spies. I want to know what happened to the plans they sent you. Don't act so surprised, Your Highness. You weren't on any mercy mission this time. Several transmissions were beamed to this ship by Rebel spies. I want to know what happened to the plans they sent you.

No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no weapons. You can't possibly… A tremor in the Force. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master. All right. Well, take care of yourself, Han. I guess that's what you're best at, ain't it?

Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan. I've got to go home. It's late, I'm in for it as it is. He is here. I'm trying not to, kid. Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess. I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money.

Leave that to me. Send a distress signal, and inform the Senate that all on board were killed. I find your lack of faith disturbing. I suggest you try it again, Luke. This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct.

No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no weapons. You can't possibly… She must have hidden the plans in the escape pod. Send a detachment down to retrieve them, and see to it personally, Commander. There'll be no one to stop us this time!

Dantooine.
They're on Dantooine. Ye-ha! As you wish. Your eyes can deceive you. Don't trust them. What good is a reward if you ain't around to use it? Besides, attacking that battle station ain't my idea of courage. It's more like…suicide.

I have traced the Rebel spies to her. Now she is my only link to finding their secret base. Dantooine. They're on Dantooine. Look, I can take you as far as Anchorhead. You can get a transport there to Mos Eisley or wherever you're going.

Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him. I don't know what you're talking about. I am a member of the Imperial Senate on a diplomatic mission to Alderaan-- Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him.

Anakin made of pictures of sand pic.twitter.com/uoOY9h9ljs

— Star Wars Memes (@jedimemes) March 1, 2018

item.title: Image Cover Test Import
item.content:encoded:
Five hours? Aw, man! Couldn't you just get me the death penalty?

I barely knew Philip, but as a clergyman I have no problem telling his most intimate friends all about him. Yes, I saw. You were doing well, until everyone died. Alright, let's mafia things up a bit. Joey, burn down the ship. Clamps, burn down the crew.

Leela, Bender, we're going grave robbing. Also Zoidberg. Shut up and take my money! But, like most politicians, he promised more than he could deliver.

Daylight and everything.

Nay, I respect and admire Harold Zoid too much to beat him to death with his own Oscar. We'll need to have a look inside you with this camera. Hey, guess what you're accessories to. Well, thanks to the Internet, I'm now bored with sex. Is there a place on the web that panders to my lust for violence?

item.title: Featured? Syndicated? This Article is BOTH!
item.description: Featured articles are being tested. Canonical too.
item.content:encoded:
1010 WINS Yes! In your face, Gandhi! Can we have Bender Burgers again? I didn't ask for a completely reasonable excuse! I asked you to get busy! Bender, quit destroying the universe! That could be 'my' beautiful soul sitting naked on a couch. If I could just learn to play this stupid thing.

No argument here. Say it in Russian! I could if you hadn't turned on the light and shut off my stereo. Bender, we're trying our best. No! The kind with looting and maybe starting a few fires! You seem malnourished.
Are you suffering from intestinal parasites?

Shut up and take my money! You can see how I lived before I met you. I'll get my kit! Oh, I don't have time for this. I have to go and buy a single piece of fruit with a coupon and then return it, making people wait behind me while I complain.
item.subHeadline: We're using this to test the tag and canonical status.
